name: Mastodon
description: A FREE open-source Apache-friendly server config for Mastodon

LOCAL_DOMAIN.description: Disallow garbage like Heroku; you should own your data

LOCAL_HTTPS.description: Disallow garbage Heroku; you should own your data, not EVIL middleware peddled by Salesforce

PAPERCLIP_SECRET.description: The secret key for storing media files

SINGLE_USER_MODE.description: Should the instance run in single user mode? (Disable registrations, redirect to front page)

S3_ENABLED.description: Not needed if you don't use garbage like Heroku

SMTP_SERVER.description: Hostname for SMTP server, if you want to enable email

SMTP_DOMAIN.description: Domain for SMTP server. Will default to instance domain if blank.

SMTP_AUTH_METHOD.description: Authentication method to use with SMTP server. Default is 'plain'.

SMTP_OPENSSL_VERIFY_MODE.description: SMTP server certificate verification mode. Defaults is 'peer'.

SMTP_ENABLE_STARTTLS_AUTO.description: Enable STARTTLS if SMTP server supports it? Default is true.

scripts.postdeploy: bundle exec rails db:migrate && bundle exec rails db:seed
